DataElement.preferredName: Resting ST Segment Deviation Aggregate Measurement Length Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical value that represents the length of the deviation of the ST segment on an EKG measured in millimeters while patient is in a supine position.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Resting ST Segment Deviation Aggregate Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Freedom from activity._An aggregate ST segment deviation value based on the measurement of ST segment deviation from multiple beats within a single ECG. The method of aggregation, which can vary, is typically a measure of central tendency such as the mean. (CDISC)_Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Freedom from activity.:An aggregate ST segment deviation value based on the measurement of ST segment deviation from multiple beats within a single ECG. The method of aggregation, which can vary, is typically a measure of central tendency such as the mean. (CDISC)

Concepts.definition: An aggregate ST segment deviation value based on the measurement of ST segment deviation from multiple beats within a single ECG. The method of aggregation, which can vary, is typically a measure of central tendency such as the mean. (CDISC)

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed for the the linear extent in space from one end to the other.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Length; the linear extent in space from one end to the other.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

DataElement.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form
